Translation of 楚竹書・程寤(en) into English.

p.seg: In the first year of kingdom,
after the birth of the lunar fase (around the ninth day) of the first month,
Da Si (mother of King Wu) saw in a dream
thorns (all over) the Shang court
Then the young descendent, Fa (later King Wu),
took the catalpa tree of the Zhou court,
planted it in their midst,
and it became pines, cipresses and oaks.
She woke up scared, and told the king.
The king did not dare to divine about it,
he told the prince, Fa,
to arrange for shaman Ming to conduct an exorcism prayer.
Invoker Xin made an exorcism prayer for the king,
shaman Shuai made an exorcism prayer for Da Si,
priest (?) Ding made an exorcism prayer for the prince, Fa.
They made an offering of silk in the ancestral temple to the gods of soil and grain,
to pray for the six termina (Heaven, Earth and the four directions?) and the mountains and rivers,
they made an aggressive exorcism towards the spirits of the Shang,
they performed the Wang and the Zheng sacrifices
and divined in the Hall of Light.
The king and the prince, Fa, both saluted (=prayed) for (one more?) auspicious dream,
to receive the mandate of the Shang from the august ruler from high.
(The king, having received the prayed for dream) rose and said:
"Fa! You should listen respectfully to this auspiciuos dream.
(The Shang ruler) treats thorns (=evil councilors) as friends and the cathalpa trees (=virtue?) as enemies
cypresses and pines (=us) assist and embrace the oaks (?) (=worthy advisors)
and the oaks (?) turn into ochre [=used as protective dye for the cathalpa trees?]
Oh! What is there to be cautious about if not (improper) friends (=alliances),
what to warn about if not the Shang?
What to use if not the trees (in the dream=worthy advisors)?
As for the trees, one must follow their inclinations
and not to go against the qualities (of its material).
If Heaven sends down sickness,
and only pleasant tastes have been used,
it cannot be cured,
the time (of death) is not far.
The grief of the Shang lies with the Zhou,
the grief of the Zhou lies with the Shang (=only one of us will survive).
(as Heaven) has chosen to make use of the Zhou,
(we must) absolutely destroy (the Shang) without hesitation (?),
(and after that) comfort (the people) with many blessings.
Only the cathalpa tree (can) destroy the unrighteous,
The cathalpa tree withered
because unrighteousness flourishes around the Shang,
causing their acts and measures to become lawless
Very bright is the one on high (=Heaven),
does (Heaven) want to bring in the thorns,
or does he want (to make true) the dream of the pine tree?
common people (use to) say:
"to spread out and be long lasting (?)
one should not forget autumn (the time of harvest) (make plans for the future?)"
(so that) it will be brightly majestic and imposing,
like oaks without limit.
Oh! Be reverent!
I have heard that Zhou will be long lasting
unwavering in toiling to destroy (the Shang). (?)
Do not employ anyone without giving him instructions
cause them to be humble, mild, harmonious and pliable,
so there will be no disaster in begetting the people,
but only utter sincerity.
Oh! What to inspect if not timeliness?
What to toil for if not harmony?
What to crave for if not cultivation (=virtue)?
What to protect if not the Way?
What to care for if not for (people's) bodies (=livelihood)?
What to strive for if not for the people?
When people plan to acquire strength (?)
it cannot be hidden (or: stored, to use later; or: good).
Be careful for later, be careful for later!
Others will use your plans,
take care of the limited time (available).
